objects.text:
GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Certified
Pink Drop Design with Crystals
Perfect Gift for Special Occasions
6-Month Warranty Included

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 Count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 64 ratings.

banner_details:
The banner features a soft, elegant jewelry presentation with a centered, minimal design set against a blush-toned gradient background framed with graceful, decorative lines. The focus is on showcasing a pair of rose gold wreath-style earrings, placed centrally for maximum prominence. The top of the layout includes a bold, uppercase text layer ("heading") in deep rose pink, followed by a refined serif subheading ("subheading") underneath. Below this sits a concise product description ("description") in a smaller, lighter maroon font. The price is boldly emphasized in the same deep rose tone ("price"), with a rounded rectangular call-to-action button beneath, labeled with "SHOP NOW" ("cta") in white on a filled rose background ("cta_background"). 

**Color Palette:**
- #FFF0F5 (Lavender Blush)
- #FFECF2 (Soft Pink)
- #D86A7A (Deep Rose Pink)
- #E9A7A7 (Blush Peach)
- #A75D6A (Muted Plum)
- #FFFFFF (White)
product_color: The product image features elegant earrings designed with a soft, feminine color palette. The dominant color is a rosy pink (#F4A6A0), used for the base metal and floral motifs, giving the design warmth and elegance. Accentuating this is a blush pink gradient (#FBC7C2) within the petal-shaped area for added dimension. Sparkling white crystals (#FFFFFF) and light grey reflections (#D1D1D1) provide contrast and highlight the intricacy of the piece. The clear stones blend smoothly with the metallic pink, while their brilliance draws attention. This harmonious blend of soft pinks and shimmering whites evokes sophistication and lends well to luxurious banner designs.
